item.title: Ethereal
item.description: As per 5e’s Border Ethereal, this coterminous plane is just slightly out of phase with the Material Plane.

item.title: Feywild
item.description: The Feywild (also sometimes called Faerie) is a vibrant verdant plane with vaguely positive-energy alignment.

item.title: Gloaming
item.description: The Gloaming is formed where the Feywild and Shadowfell meet, similar to a para-elemental plane.

item.title: Material Plane
item.description: The plane that contains Columbia and human affairs. Also called the Mortal Realm, especially by the fey.

item.title: Shadowfell
item.description: The Shadowfell is a cold dark plane with a vaguely negative-energy alignment. The Shadowfell is a dark reflection of the Material Plane.

item.title: Spirit Realm
item.description: The Spirit Realm goes by many names: The Dreaming, the Astral, the Deep Ethereal.

item.title: index
item.description: The planes of existence that exist in the World Anew setting. If your character would know this content if they have proficiency in Arcana.

item.title: index
item.description: See: Google Docs: World Anew - Lawless - Player’s guide (which might eventually get migrated here) D&D 5e doc - House rules .

item.title: 2025-09-17 - Session -1
item.description: Zach, Bill, & Zbo got together to chat about rules while Tobin and Stacy where out.

item.title: 2025-09-23 - Session 0
item.description: Wrapped up Dargrim (Interlude I - Finnan’s Windsong).
